Uses of Package
com.octo.captcha

Packages that use com.octo.captcha
com.octo.captcha This is the base package for JCAPTCHAs. 
com.octo.captcha.image Package for implementations of Pix Captchas : Captcha with pics chalenges. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy This package a struture for implementing gimpys
A gimpy is PixCaptcha with the question "Spell the word".  
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage this package provides implementations of the WordToImage interface. 
com.octo.captcha.image.gimpy.wordtoimage.textpaster implementations of AbstractTextPaster 
com.octo.captcha.service This is the base package for JCAPTCHA service implementation. 
com.octo.captcha.service.captchastore   
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha used by com.octo.captcha
Captcha
          This interface represent a CAPTCHA.
CaptchaFactory
          Interface for the CAPTCHA factories.
CaptchaServiceException
          To be thrown when a service user is doing an illegal operation (typically wrang operation flow errors).
 

Classes in com.octo.captcha used by com.octo.captcha.image
Captcha
          This interface represent a CAPTCHA.
CaptchaEngine
          CaptchaEngine is the main interface from an application point of view : it uses CapchaFactories in order to return new captchas.
CaptchaFactory
          Interface for the CAPTCHA factories.
